errors.error_description: The installation command incorrectly specifies the package name as `cellrank-2` instead of `cellrank`.
correction_candidates: Correct the command to `pip install cellrank`.
Change the command to `pip install cellrank==2.0.0`.
Correct the command to `pip install --upgrade cellrank`.
Use conda to install: `conda install -c conda-forge cellrank`.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the command to `pip install cellrank`.
